column4: Does anybody have any clue about the main menu? Point me to a place to study up? Where is the starting point?
describe what you see, what you want added what you want remove?

That's my idea. I don't know how to do that. I'm not even sure how to search for background, how to study the issue, because I don't know what to call things. I'm floundering in detailed docs for 'XDG' without having any idea what controls menus, in a practical user sense.
That is more extreme even than I want to get into. I don't want to do a complete reinstall of Ubuntu if I can help it.
